entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
